#summary Third-Party Libraries
#sidebar SideBarTableOfContents

The following third-party libraries have been used (thus far) in the project.

 * NCalc (v1.3.8)
  * http://ncalc.codeplex.com/
 * Log4net (v2.0.0)
  * http://logging.apache.org/log4net/
 * zlibnet (v1.3)
  * http://zlibnet.codeplex.com/
 * NUnit (v2.6.2)
  * http://nunit.org/
 * Moq (v4.1.1)
  * https://code.google.com/p/moq/
 * NewtonSoft JSON (v5.0.8)
  * http://james.newtonking.com/json
